attributes.review: Don’t get fooled! Just like the Trump presidency, this app is a hoax! Slow download, bad UI, lots of bugs, keeps on crashing... Another #trumpfail

attributes.review: I’m still confused at the fact that we literally have an orange as a president. What a shame. Anyways  stream the Sofia the First theme song for clear skin, good grades, and money. ✨🧚🏻‍♂️💞

attributes.review: this app is horrible! i open it and the first thing i see is a child predator! not to mention the fact that it gave my phone a virus . it kept glitching and now i have to pay $1000 to fix it. don’t download it!

attributes.review: I thought this was a wonderful app about “our” fat orange Cheeto that we don’t call president” anyways stream stay gold!

attributes.review: honestly took way too long to download, once it did i opened it and it wiped everything and took my data... then i got a call telling me to vote for him even though i can’t and wouldn’t have anyway. but seriously this is just the worst.
